welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lorraine, Canada! Get ready to be enchanted by our charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and embrace all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mirabel Airport, primarily used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all cargo and freight operations at the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the YUL Free Wi-Fi network.
